data.convo: Let's go to the cinema tonight , shall we ? Good idea . Is there a good movie on ? What about ' Farewell My Concubine ' ? I've been wanting to see it for a long time . All right . But it'll be difficult to buy tickets I suppose . My brother has offered me two tickets for this evening . What time does it begin ? At eight thirty . I'll come for you at about eight . OK , I'll be waiting .
